data.question: What is the name of the new porous aluminium phosphonate discovered?
What method was used to follow structural changes in Al-CAU-60·6 HCl?
data.answer: Powder X-ray diffraction, EDX analysis, and IR spectroscopy

data.question: Can Al-CAU-60 adsorb HBr into its framework?
What is the role of highly acidic reaction conditions in the synthesis of MOFs?
data.answer: To achieve protonation of the framework for charge balance with tri- instead of tetravalent metal cations

data.question: Which two frameworks were found to reversibly adsorb HCl in a systematic study of eleven MOFs?
Is the HCl adsorption in Al-CAU-60·6 HCl reversible?
What is the charge-to-radius ratio of aluminium?
How many HCl molecules per formula unit does Al-CAU-60·6 HCl demonstrate reversible desorption of?
data.answer: Six HCl molecules per formula unit

data.question: Is Al-CAU-60·6 HCl stable in highly acidic media?
What is the significance of the high-throughput study in the discovery of CAU-60·6 HCl?
data.answer: It allowed for the exploration of a large parameter space to ensure protonation of the linker and discover new phases

data.question: What happens to Al-CAU-60·6 HCl when immersed in deionized water?
data.answer: Rapid release of HCl within 2 minutes

data.question: Can Al-CAU-60 adsorb gases other than HCl?
data.answer: Yes, it can also adsorb HBr

data.question: What is the wt % HCl loading observed in Al-CAU-60·6 HCl?
Is the synthesis approach for Al-CAU-60 transferable to other trivalent metal ions?
What structural feature allows Al-CAU-60 to adsorb HCl?
data.answer: The positively charged framework and the presence of Cl- ions in the pores

data.question: Does the structure of Al-CAU-60 change upon HCl desorption?
What is the main advantage of using aluminium in MOFs according to the text?
data.answer: Its high charge-to-radius ratio, high abundance, and low toxicity

data.question: How many porous aluminium phosphonates were known before the discovery of CAU-60·6 HCl?
Is the HCl adsorption process in Al-CAU-60·6 HCl confirmed by IR spectroscopy?
What is the impact of the molar ratio of Al3+ to HCl on the product formation in the synthesis of Al-CAU-60·6 HCl?
data.answer: It mainly depends on the molar ratio of Al3+ to HCl for product formation
